channel.title: UNIV-LILLE - OpenStack cloud on France Grilles Cloud Status

item.title: UNIV-LILLE Datacenter downtime due to datacenter relocation
item.description: Description: Datacenter downtime due to datacenter relocation scheduled for April 7, 2022 until April 28, 2022.
item.content: Description: Datacenter downtime due to datacenter relocation scheduled for April 7, 2022 until April 28, 2022.

item.title: [Resolved] UNIV-LILLE Datacenter Blackout
item.description: Description: Major maintenance of datacenter power supply (blackout) scheduled for October 19, 2021.
item.content: Description: Major maintenance of datacenter power supply (blackout) scheduled for October 19, 2021.
